Constructor & Destructor Documentation

GrTextureCube::GrTextureCube ( const UPath &  name,
GrTextureBase::EFORMAT  format,
unsigned int  width,
unsigned int  flags 
)

class GrTextureCube

always uses a linear magnification filter, nearest minification filter, and linear mipmap filter. For the constructor that takes images, 6 images must be specified. The images passed in must all have the same width and height, and must also be square.

ctor & dtor
